body: Yall just wish you were a shota who got to knock up Inuyama.  Dont be jelly.
Lol this hentai is great, why are you conplaining?

Whoosh
you haev a smol pener
Give me Inuyama x Oogaki or Nadeshiko x Shimarin, not this. Being a dominatrix doesn't even match Inuyama's personality.

This is a good doujin, but I hate how series with lots of Yuri subtext and no major male character like Yuru Camp are way more likely to get het self-insert doujins than Yuri ones. That or translators prefer NSFW and Het doujins in general over SFW and Yuri doujins in general. Either way, it's bad.
This is why we can't have nice things. This is trash
@kuroyashasakata: Who the hell reads those ? NEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEERRRRRRRDDDDD !!! (Sorry mate, I'm just feeling cheeky. Thanks for the info)

@traxo470: The other english ver. is done by doujin.com, this one is done by Redlantern. Clearly even if you don't appreciate the scanlation team for their effort, you could have just check the credit page
You know, Nhentai, you should put the "forced" tag on all of the re-uploaded hentai. Certainly if you plan to keep forcing them down our throat like this.
